entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @Mike_Pence You've got to admit when @VP #Pence plays the loyal #Trump stooge to deflect from #DearLeader's incompetence on race and #COVID19, both of which are killing Americans, #Pence swings for the #MAGA fences and talks about the importance of money. A true #Republican. 🤑
